code: import React from"react";import{auth,provider}from'../firebase-config';import{signInWithPopup}from"firebase/auth";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{setIsAuth}=_ref;let navigate=useNavigate();const signInWithGoogle=()=>{signInWithPopup(auth,provider).then(result=>{localStorage.setItem("isAuth",true);setIsAuth(true);navigate("/");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loginPage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:" Sign In With Google To Continue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-with-google-btn",onClick:signInWithGoogle,children:"Sign In"})]});}export default Login;
